function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High proportion of cases needing to self-isolate and contacts needing to be traced","Impact":"Ineffective reproduction number (R0) above 1","Mitigation":"Implementing self-isolation and contact tracing measures combined with moderate physical distancing","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, surveillance technology","People":"General public, healthcare workers","Owner":"Public health authorities, healthcare institutions"},{"Description":"Ineffective control of SARS-CoV-2 transmission due to self-washing of masks","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 infection among healthcare workers","Mitigation":"Mandating the use of hospital laundry for mask washing, discouraging self-washing of masks","Technologies":"Laundry facilities with appropriate disinfection processes","People":"Healthcare workers","Owner":"Healthcare institutions"}]}
